Class Process

  • java.lang.Object
    • Process
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants

    public class Process
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants
    This class contains data associated with processes, and methods for manipulating this data as well as methods for displaying a process in the GUI. You will probably want to add more methods to this class.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface Constants

        EAST, END_IO, END_PROCESS, IO_REQUEST, NEW_PROCESS, NORTH, SOUTH, SWITCH_PROCESS, WEST

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Process(long memorySize, long creationTime)
      Creates a new process with given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics g, int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Draws this process as a colored box with a process ID inside.
      long getMemoryNeeded()
      Returns the amount of memory needed by this process.
      void leftMemoryQueue(long clock)
      This method is called when the process leaves the memory queue (and enters the cpu queue).
      void updateStatistics(Statistics statistics)
      Updates the statistics collected by the given Statistic object, adding data collected by this process.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Process

        public Process(long memorySize,
       long creationTime)
        Creates a new process with given parameters. Other parameters are randomly determined.
        Parameters:
        memorySize - The size of the memory unit.
        creationTime - The global time when this process is created.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
        int x,
        int y,
        int w,
        int h)
        Draws this process as a colored box with a process ID inside.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context.
        x - The leftmost x-coordinate of the box.
        y - The topmost y-coordinate of the box.
        w - The width of the box.
        h - The height of the box.

      • leftMemoryQueue

        public void leftMemoryQueue(long clock)
        This method is called when the process leaves the memory queue (and enters the cpu queue).
        Parameters:
        clock - The time when the process leaves the memory queue.

      • getMemoryNeeded

        public long getMemoryNeeded()
        Returns the amount of memory needed by this process.
        Returns:
        The amount of memory needed by this process.

      • updateStatistics

        public void updateStatistics(Statistics statistics)
        Updates the statistics collected by the given Statistic object, adding data collected by this process. This method is called when the process leaves the system.
        Parameters:
        statistics - The Statistics object to be updated.
